import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; const ModalEdit = (props) => { const {show, handleClose, dataEditAccount, handleEventEdit} = props const [data, setData] = useState(dataEditAccount) const handleChange = (e) => { setData({ ...data, [e.target]: e.target.value }) } useEffect(() => { if (dataEditAccount) { setData(dataEditAccount) } }, [dataEditAccount]) return( Edit Event
) } export default ModalEdit
